name: Spin me out!
description:
"You're Irene, a shy university student attending a party you'd rather not go to.
You have a bad feeling about this, but decide to go through with it.
What's the worst that could happen?"

Hello! 
This is my first Visual Novel! I made it during NaNoReNo 2020!
It's a bit short and very simple, I hope to improve and do even better in the future, but for now I am very happy I manages to finish it!

Sadly I didn't have anyone to test the mac version, so hopefully it works!
